itinerary.mapNote: Sea caves and turquoise coves. Small fishing hamlet. 0–50m.
Ancient ruins above coastal cliffs. Olive groves. 200m.
Sunken Lycian city of Simena visible from boats. 0m.
Lycian rock tombs and St. Nicholas church. Trail end. 10m.

waypoints.name: Kaş Town (Start)
waypoints.note: Trek start. Lycian Way marker stone. Roman theatre.

waypoints.name: Kekova Sunken City
waypoints.note: Sunken Lycian ruins visible underwater. UNESCO area.

waypoints.name: Simena Castle
waypoints.note: Crusader castle above Kaleköy. Finest views on route.

waypoints.name: Myra Rock Tombs
waypoints.note: Best-preserved Lycian rock-cut tombs in Turkey. 4th c BC.
